OOC: There is something illegal there. 3 can't be at two places at the 
same time. As such, this post is not valid. As a friend's advice, 
Ellen, I suggest you divide your posts in two, a part of description 
of your char's actions and a part quoting your char. It'll be clearer 
this way. =)

Also, I hope it was you, Ellen. If it was another "hacker", there will 
be punishment this time.
